Makes CurlyAI (180) target and shoot the player, using projectile NPC 123 from her bossfight.
First patch fixes a collision bug in 123 so it doesn't go through walls.
Second patch writes the entirety of NPC 180 and 181 (her machine gun) because it's a ton of small patches
all throughout both.
CurlyAI is in NpcRegu but make sure to change the spritesheet of Npc123 in NPC.tbl.
Throw those bullet sprites from NpcCurly into Loading.bmp or something that's what I did in my mod.

0x43FDFE
83 E0 0F 74 07 C7 45 FC 01 00 00 00 EB 3A 8B 4D
08 8B 51 04 83 E2 0F 74 07 C7 45 FC 01 00 00 00
EB 26 8B 45 08 8B 48 04 83 E1 0F 74 07 C7 45 FC
01 00 00 00 EB 12 8B 55 08 8B 42 04 83 E0 0F

0x44B210

C3


These next two patches change her polar star (setting flag 563 so she uses npc182 instead of npc181)
to shoot the missiles that Balrog_Rocket shoots (npc170). Remember to have those sprites loaded via npc.tbl editing.

0x44C296
8B 7D 08 83 BF A8 00 00 00 00 75 05 E9 76 03 00
00 31 DB 90 8B 97 A8 00 00 00
0x44C470
6A 70 53 53 53 53 8B 57 0C 81 C2 00 06 00 00 52
8B 4F 08 81 E9 00 08 00 00 51 68 AA 00 00 00 E8
3C 2B 02 00 83 C4 20 90 90 90 53 6A 03 8B 47 0C
05 00 06 00 00 50 8B 4D 08 8B 51 08 81 EA 00 08
00 00 52 E8 D8 E7 FB FF 83 C4 10 EB 4B 6A 70 53

08 05 00 08 00 00 50 68 AA 00 00 00 E8 EF 2A 02
00 83 C4 20 90 90 53 6A 03 8B 57 0C 81 C2 00 06
00 00 52 8B 45 08 8B 48 08 81 C1 00 08 00 00 51

83 7A 4C 00 75 4D 6A 70 53 6A 00 53 53 8B 4F 0C
81 E9 00 08 00 00 51 8B 47 08 2D 00 04 00 00 50
68 AA 00 00 00 E8 96 2A 02 00 83 C4 20 90 90 53

48 08 81 E9 00 04 00 00 51 E8 32 E7 FB FF 83 C4
10 EB 4A 6A 70 53 6A 02 53 53 8B 47 0C 2D 00 08
00 00 50 8B 57 08 81 C2 00 04 00 00 52 68 AA 00
00 00 E8 49 2A 02 00 83 C4 20 90 90 53 6A 03 8B
4F 0C

Minimizes MG shooting
0x44C1A0
83 79 78 10 7E 0A

Minimizes rocket shooting
